name.ja: <ruby>不条理の虚孔<rt>アブサード・チャージホール</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack targeting your Attack Position Cyberse Type monster.

effect.en: This turn, your opponent cannot declare an attack, and your monsters cannot be destroyed by battle. You can gain LP equal to [the difference between the ATK of the attack target and the ATK of the attacking monster] x 2.
